description:
Will NOT work in webOS 2.0.  Do not purchase if you have webOS 2.0.  I am working on a fix & will get it out as soon as I can.
Your own cheerful holiday fireplace!  Features animated roaring fire and authentic crackling sound!  Feeling cold?  Just start up the Yule Log and your phone will keep you toasty and warm!  This is the ad-free version of the popular Yule Log application that can be found on PreCentral.  Recent updates include a simple preferences system and landscape mode.
